admin/newtailpartnerbr-newtail-media.com: Use in fields on pages that don't have context and need to force some category for the banner or in specific cases.
admin/newtailpartnerbr-newtail-media.ban: Use the same size registered on the ad platform.
Use the same size registered on the ad platform. If not passed, the desktop media size value will be used.
admin/newtailpartnerbr-newtail-media.sea: Choose where the tag will be displayed in the product card.
By default, 'sponsored' will be used with automatic translation. To override, fill in this field.
This field should be edited by developers only. By default, '.vtex-search-result-3-x-searchResultContainer #gallery-layout-container' will be used.

Use only first SKU. If checked, only the first SKU of the product will be used to search for the product in Newtail. If unchecked, all SKUs of the product will be used to search for the product in Newtail.
